children.text:
tmplfile = if @producer.config['htmlversion'].to_i == 5
                   File.expand_path('./html/layout-html5.html.erb', ReVIEW::Template::TEMPLATE_DIR)
                 else
                   File.expand_path('./html/layout-xhtml1.html.erb', ReVIEW::Template::TEMPLATE_DIR)
                 end
